ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
Parody of tv show Heroes, with a surprise Evil Mastermind.
New gags written for Dave Berg's drawings.
Monroe is cast in a school production of High School Musical and even though the show is shut down before the performance, he still manages to screw it up.
Ways that technology has made some old movie plot devices unusable.
Tad discusses the movies Lady And The Tramp and Star Wars, and his class assignment to watch over an egg as if it's a baby.
The Black Spy sends a robotic peace dove to the White Spy that turns out to be a bomb.
Political cartoons on a single theme by a variety of newspaper cartoonists.
Comparisons of politicians' statements that change their positions over time.
Things that can go wrong for serious players of the game Halo.
Parody of the movie American Gangster, showing how it lifted key scenes from other gangster movies.
